sections.description: A variety of components and tools hosted directly on this site. Some are for fun, and others are some common web app functionalities.

contents.description: A simple web page that allows users to choose a pre-made theme. The chosen theme is overwritten for specific pages.
A prop inspired by Valve's Aperture Science Portal Gun. Powered by an arduino using LEDs, a speaker, and a few switches.
Using krita to mock some designs, I was able to bring imagination to life.
